benefitsList: Space-available room upgrades at select properties
80% Bonus on Hilton Honors Base Points earned
Daily food & beverage credit at select U.S. brands; daily continental breakfast outside the U.S.
5th night free on standard room stays booked with 100% Points
Check-in, choose your room, and order ahead via the Hilton Honors App
Two complimentary bottles of water per stay at select properties
attributes.enrollmentInstructions: Enroll via your American Express account to activate Hilton Honors Gold status; terms apply.
